categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic members

nodes.text: Garul was a male Bothan working with the Alliance to Restore the Republic, moving refugees from Cloud City to Kaliska. He used the alias Silver Fur while on the job. He was killed by Jodo Kast and Zardra sometime between the Battle of Hoth and the Battle of Endor in Cloud City, due to a datacard that he held with information on the location of Rebel refugees within Cloud City.
